original_text: If the part of the dough offered as firstfruits is holy, then the whole batch is holy; if the root is holy, so are the branches.
korean_text: 제사하는 처음 익은 곡식 가루가 거룩한즉 떡덩이도 그러하고 뿌리가 거룩한즉 가지도 그러하니라

sentences.original_text: If part of dough offered as firstfruits is holy
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 첫 열매로 바쳐진 반죽의 일부가 거룩하다면

sentences.original_text: then the whole batch is holy
